title: allenjohn
author: allenjohn
created_time: August 31, 2023, 07:04:36 AMLast edit: September 04, 2023, 07:56:44 PM by allenjohn
content: iForumTalk: Earn Money While Engaging in DiscussionsAre you passionate about online discussions and want to turn your valuable insights into real rewards? Look no further than iForumTalk, an innovative discussion forum that offers a unique opportunity to get paid for participating in conversations on a wide range of topics.Diverse Categories to ExploreiForumTalk caters to a diverse audience by providing a platform for discussions in various categories. Whether you have a flair for entertainment, a keen interest in cryptocurrency, a knack for making money online, or expertise in forex trading, you'll find a community of like-minded individuals to engage with. The forum also covers topics such as earning website reviews, trending news, and sports discussions.Generous Reward SystemWhat sets iForumTalk apart is its generous reward system, which values your contributions. Whether you're creating a new topic or replying to existing ones, you'll earn 30 points for each post. This means you can quickly accumulate points as you actively participate in the forum.Low Payout ThresholdWith iForumTalk, you don't have to wait long to cash out your earnings. The payout threshold is set at just 500 points, equivalent to $0.5. This means you can start receiving your well-deserved rewards sooner rather than later.Flexible Payment OptionsiForumTalk understands the importance of convenience, so it offers multiple payment options for your earnings. You can choose to receive your rewards in popular cryptocurrencies like Dogecoin or opt for payment through Perfect Money, Payeer, or UPI, ensuring flexibility that suits your preferences.If you're eager to join a community where your opinions and contributions are not only valued but also financially rewarded, iForumTalk is the ideal platform for you. Visit https://iforumtalk.com today and start earning while enjoying meaningful discussions in a wide range of exciting topics. It's more than just a forum; it's an opportunity to turn your participation into tangible rewards.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: You are offering $1 for 50 topic. I doubt anyone would be there for solely earning purpose. Maybe some people who may get interested info there, would be interested to discuss.Anyway, I can share you better plan. You can reach out me here or better in telegram- @LT_Mouse

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: It's only sending unsolicited private message that make someone lose 1000 points? what about spam reply or thread? While you have stated there's a posting quality, but most of the thread in your forum are created by AI or copy pasta from the other sources, do you think it's a high quality? with such payrate every user will create many thread as much as possible and wouldn't replying someone else thread.Quote from: https://iforumtalk.com/office1. Spam: Is not tolerated on the forum and it will be removed immediately. Sending unsolicited private messages is considered spam, and you will lose 1000 Points per each report. If you continue to spam the forum your account will be banned for life. Stay safe!3. Posting quality: I don't want to see gibberish or posts that don't offer helpful information. Your posts should be quality enough. They need to be helpful and supply the reader with valuable information so they can join the site.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: allenjohn on August 31, 2023, 07:04:36 AMIforumtalk is a discussion forum where you will get paid while creating topics on various categories like entertainment, cryto currency, make money online, forex trading, Earning website review, trending news, sport discussion.Paying people to post and create topics for just about anything, without quality control.. what could go wrong? I expect it to end just like that failed Yobit forum from a few years ago.Quote from: allenjohn on August 31, 2023, 07:04:36 AMRATES for POST20 Points per Topic Create5 Points per ReplyI skimmed the forum and situation as a expected, people spamming new topics without anyone engaging in discussions as its more profitable.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Rikafip on August 31, 2023, 10:04:53 AMPaying people to post and create topics for just about anything, without quality control.. what could go wrong? I expect it to end just like that failed Yobit forum from a few years ago.I wouldn't take this seriously.Just another wannabe theymos, smart attempt to start something-talk based on the way this forum works. Yobit tried to avoid the negative connotation on bitcointalk by creating their own board, even with fairly good payouts (at least they promised), they only managed to bring in spammers.By the way, what happened to that forum? Is it still up to date?

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on August 31, 2023, 10:56:26 AM]I wouldn't take this seriously.Of course, that attempt is doomed to fail as they are trying to do things backwards. Quote from: examplens on August 31, 2023, 10:56:26 AMBy the way, what happened to that forum? Is it still up to date?I just checked and it looks like its still alive and still paying for posting, but with barely any activity compared with how it was in the early days days as payrate is shitty (paying in something called Talk Token).

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: I'm really interested in how much it would take for someone to earn $1, while adhering to all the rules, especially those regarding spam and the quality of posts? I don't see that it can succeed in the way the owner envisioned, because it is too much work for so little money, and I believe that even the most stubborn spammers will not see their opportunity in this.

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: I don't even think the brokest of the broke would try to accommodate this offer. This is way to much work for very little pay. 2 pennies per topic is insane. @OP you could find some interested people but you would likely have to raise the rate by a lot and escrow funds so users know they're getting paid.

comments.author: Knight Hider
comments.body: Quote from: allenjohn on August 31, 2023, 07:04:36 AMRATES for POST20 Points per Topic Create5 Points per ReplyPayout is - 1000 Points - $1The wear and tear of my keyboard costs more than $1 per 200 replies.--Knight Hider

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Other forum creators fail even if they pay good to their poster. How much more on the offer you placed here? Put your place to the position of poster and see how stressful to post something and you need to reach that thousand points before you can earn a some bucks. Maybe try another method since for sure what you posted will never be appealing to majority of posters here so read up the comments and learn something since the post given by people is a valid comments or suggestion.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.created_time: September 01, 2023, 11:56:19 AMLast edit: September 01, 2023, 12:07:57 PM by robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: allenjohn on August 31, 2023, 07:04:36 AMIforumtalk is a discussion forum where you will get paid while creating topics on various categories like entertainment, cryto currency, make money online, forex trading, Earning website review, trending news, sport discussion.RATES for POST20 Points per Topic Create5 Points per ReplyPayout is - 1000 Points - $1Dogecoin, Perfect money, Payeer, UPII was sipping my coffee when I saw this and I almost spit my coffee Â So you have 300 threads and posts and one of your posts turns out to be spam so you're going to lose all your earnings, That's too harsh they are too demanding on their users but their pay rate is not acceptable to any forum poster, It will invite spam even if they have active posters because there are few categories, they should add more categories and interest, and they should create sub-forums also.And most importantly increase the pay rate, you want quality post then give a quality pay rate.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: What Forum is this, I visited her this is not pleasant in view for her design.To get $1 need 200 posts or 50 new threads? Too low but I do not know why the purpose of post in pay is to increase the popularity of that forum?But I see a lot of people create threads but there is never a reply I check.I think there will be little interest. Lol

comments.author: allenjohn
comments.body: Hi Everyone,We have increased the rates of earning per post.Also Payout is at just $0.5What are you waiting for?Enjoy earning with our Forum guys!.Thanks

comments.author: Helena Yu
comments.body: Quote from: allenjohn on September 02, 2023, 06:04:13 AMHi Everyone,We have increased the rates of earning per post.Also Payout is at just $0.5What are you waiting for?Enjoy earning with our Forum guys!.ThanksHave you ever payout an user in your forum? I think it's better if you can be transparent to share the TX ID.I see you changed some of your rules, but it's still incomplete, how much is 500 points? before you said 1000 points is equivalent to $1, I guess 500 points is $0.5.If you still use different payout for creating thread and reply, people will choose to create the higher one. I don't like scale reward system, quality post is subjective and you can choose to pay with lowest reward.There were many questions above, try to reply it @OP.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: allenjohn on September 02, 2023, 06:04:13 AMHi Everyone,We have increased the rates of earning per post.Also Payout is at just $0.5What are you waiting for?Enjoy earning with our Forum guys!.ThanksI don't know where you get this point system You should stop using a point system when you are rewarding your users be specific about the amount that your users are going to get Also stop using range on their post rewards be specific so your users will have a clear idea on what they are really going to get when they request their payout.It will backfire if they expect the maximum and you've given them the minimum be specific when it comes to rewards.Quote30-50 Points per Topic Create (Depend on Quality)10-20 Points per Reply (Depend on Quality)Payout is - 500 PointsNOTE: RATES ARE INCREASED ON 2ND SEPT, 2023.Please update any feedback from members.I still don't find your forum attractive for quality posters even with a new rates.
